org.mojavemvc.core
Class MappedControllerDatabase

java.lang.Object
  org.mojavemvc.core.MappedControllerDatabase
All Implemented Interfaces:
ControllerDatabase
public class MappedControllerDatabase
extends Object
implements ControllerDatabase

A single instance of this class is meant to exist in the front controller context, to be shared by multiple threads. The only methods that can be called during requests are read methods. This class is immutable once created, and thus is thread-safe.

Author:
Luis Antunes
